meaningMnemonic: There's a <radical>tsunami</radical> coming and you want to be <radical>together</radical> with it by <radical>yourself</radical> (oneself) so you go to the <kanji>harbor</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: As you look around at the <kanji>harbor</kanji> in your last moments you suddenly see someone in the water. It's <reading>こう</reading>いち! He's sitting in an inner tube in the harbor waiting for the tsunami too.
